headline: 1 Monster Growth Stock Down 70% to Buy Right Now
summary: Recent investor favorite Celsius Holdings (NASDAQ: CELH) has not followed this trend.  The disruptive energy drink brand is down 70% from highs this year after seeing a massive slowdown in sales.  After achieving over 10% market share in the energy drink category in the U.S., Celsius stock rocketed more than 40,000% in 10 years, making it one of the best-performing stocks of the last decade.
